scripts.dev: (cd local && docker-compose down || true) && cross-env npm_config_yes=true JWT_SECRET="{\"type\":\"HS256\",\"key\":\"3EK6FD+o0+c7tzBNVfjpMkNDi2yARAAKzQlk8O2IKoxQu4nF7EdAh8s3TwpHwrdWT6R\"}" MIGRATIONS_HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SSL=0 MIGRATIONS_HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey DEEPLINKS_URL=http://host.docker.internal:3006 PORT=3006 nodemon index.ts
scripts.package:unbuild: rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && (cd ./migrations && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../) && (cd ./imports && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../) && (cd ./imports/gql && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../) && (cd ./imports/router && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../) && (cd ./tests && rimraf ./*.js && rimraf ./*.js.map && rimraf ./*.d.ts && cd ../)
scripts.package:publish: npm run package:build && npm publish --access public && npm run package:unbuild
scripts.test: export HASURA_PATH=localhost:8080; export HASURA_SSL=0; export HASURA_SECRET=myadminsecretkey; DEBUG='materialized-path:*' jest
